queries.query:
from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "import")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "import")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "car")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "car")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "water")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "water")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar" or r["_field"] == "import" or r["_field"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"import": "grid_in"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.grid_in + r.solar - r.export }))

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zappi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar" or r["_field"] == "import" or r["_field"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["range"] == "totals")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"import": "grid_in"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.grid_in + r.solar - r.export }))
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "MyEnergi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar_max")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

spec.description: Energy usage graphs based on daily totals.
spec.name: MyEnergi (Totals)
